image.title: All My Job Feed (all saved searches combined) jobs | upwork.com

item.title: Dot Net Developer,WPF - Contractor-YK - Upwork
item.description:
Dot Net Developer,WPF - Contractor

Roles and Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and deliver Web and Windows applications per requirements
• Translate functional/business needs into technical requirements.
• Develop test plans, prepare test data, test, and document results.
• Create and deliver documentation as necessary to ensure proper use of changed and newly implemented efforts.
• Support and maintenance of existing Web (ASP .Net) and Windows (WPF) applications.
• Analyze production support issues to determine root cause and take necessary course of action for resolution, including direct interaction with business analysts and end-users.
• Keep management, team members and stakeholders aware of obstacles and status changes in a timely manner.

Skills / Experience:
Required:
• Minimum 5 years of extensive .Net experience in new program development, configuration of existing systems, new package/system evaluation, back-end and front-end development.
• C#, ASP.Net Web Forms & MVC using .Net Framework 4.0 and above
• Web API using Dot Net Core or standard framework (Nice to have)
• WPF framework (Must have)
• SQL Server 2012 and above
• HTML/CSS, jQuery, JSON, JavaScript
• SVN / GIT / Bitbucket repository
• Experience working in Scrum teams
• A Good understanding  of OOP principles
• GIT repository, BitBucket
• SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services) packages
• Experience working in Scrum teams
• Familiar with Design patterns. Hands on experience with design pattern will be plus.
• A Good understanding  of OOP principles
• A good understanding of N-tier architecture
• Outstanding verbal and written communication skills
• Strong troubleshooting skills and attention to detail.
• Must be able to learn new functional areas quickly and gain credibility with users.
• Experience with full project lifecycle


Budget: $1,250
Posted On: December 07, 2021 05:05 UTC
Category: Desktop Software Development
Skills:Microsoft SQL Server, .NET Framework, Windows Presentation Foundation
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: [GCP-705] SAP Cloud For Customer- Get paid to solve and review the questions - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for SMEs to solve and review questions on SAP Cloud for Customer. These questions will be used in the assessment/ interview during the hiring process and we need to ensure that the Questions, Problem statements, Options, the answer, and/or Codes are all valid and correct.

We have 40 Questions on SAP Cloud For Customer and we pay 1$ per question for review and feedback.
Budget: $40
Review and Feedback terms:
1. You attempt the assessment (with the questions) and should score at least 80% or more. This indicates that you have the required knowledge and competency to review and give feedback related to the skill/ subject area.
2. You must provide detailed feedback for each of the questions. (feedback parameters and details mentioned below)
3.  Additionally, you will be given a bonus for each error that you find in the question.
(To a maximum of $1 per issue, It will be up to our final judgment if your error is valid and it will not be debatable).

*Guidelines for Review*
1. Upon receipt of the assessment link please complete the test in the given time and in one sitting.
2. Note down any errors or issues you observe on the questions.
3. Upon completion of the assessment, we will share the result link, where you can give us feedback on the questions.
4. Feedback Format for the questions:
    4.1 Check if the questions are solvable or not
    4.2 Wrong examples (if applicable).
    4.3 Wrong Answer keys mentioned in the option.
    4.4 Grammatical errors in the question and in the option
    4.5 Errors in the code (if applicable)
    4.6 Wrong Tags
5. Please rate the questions in the Assessment on a scale of 1 to 5.
    5.1 Quality -(1-Poor, 2-Fair, 3-Good, 4-Very Good, 5-Excellent)
    5.2 Difficulty Level- (1-Basic, 2-Novice, 3-Intermediate, 4-Advanced, 5-Expert)
6 Is the assessment relevant to the skills AND Is it testing/checking the knowledge for the given skillset?
7. As a last step carry out a plagiarism check. If the question(s) is/are found anywhere please share the source information/URL with us.

Update the feedback in the feedback form which will be shared in the chat in which you will have to give your feedback for each question.

Budget: $40
Posted On: December 07, 2021 05:04 UTC
Category: Desktop Software Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior Angular Architect - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are looking for a Senior Angular Architect

We have on-boarding funnel of 30-100 pages. Where every page/screen is a simple question and customers are expected to either click a radio button, fill a single text box or pick a option from drop down etc. Think ONE CLICK FUNNEL.


You are expected to ARCHITECT so that future iteration of funnels can be built at very fast pace. Business team or product designer should be able to drag and drop and build a brand new funnel as it reuses the same 20-30 components all the time. Taking the existing web application and building components so that the DEV time reduces for next iterations is the main ask.

Only apply if you:

[ ] 3+ years of experience with Angular web application
[ ] Customer obsesses and strive for designing beautiful UI/UX
[ ] Excellent at debugging and fixing bugs
[ ] Can read, understand, and OPTIMIZE existing code-bases whenever see fit
[ ] Team Player. Enjoy when the team wins, rather than just wining alone
[ ] Very Punctual, Honest, and Curious by nature
[ ] Love to participate in planning and brainstorming and always CONTRIBUTING
[ ] Great at communicating ideas, concepts, and even disagreements with the team
[ ] Have a minimum of 40 hrs per week
[ ] Have a minimum availability for 3 months consecutively

What all things will be provided?

[ ] A detailed walk-through of the existing code-bases & setup, its features, flaws
[ ] Working directly with lead engineers & project owners
[ ] Work with CTO on planning and brainstorming when needed
[ ] Pay of $8-15/hr based on your capabilities & experience
[ ] Reward of $500 at the end based on peer reviews & the CTO feedback

Note: An NDA must be signed before starting the project as the codebase is a Proprietary property

Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 22:56 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:Responsive Design, Web Application, Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, Angular Materials
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Software Architect - Advisor - .Net, AWS, APIs - Upwork
item.description:
Objectives
- Provide technology recommendations for instant push notifications with 0 second delay
- Performance Optimization


Our application is a complex web based application with complex 3rd party integrations. The application is consumer based application; it is already developed and live. We are looking for a technology guru to use their past expert experience advise to optimize the application performance and provide advise on the best push notifications.

Technology Stack: AWS, C# .Net, SQL Server, Angular JS

You must have a strong hands-on experience in the modern technologies and must have a proven track record that demonstrates your skills and abilities for this job.

This job will require frequent phone conversations and meeting with multiple teams, you must have good communication skills.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 22:17 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:.NET Framework, Microsoft SQL Server, Startup Company, Microservices, Software Architecture & Design, Push Notifications
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Web Application Migration - Upwork
item.description:
We have old Ecommerce Application developed in Visual Studio 2008, IIS 6/7 and SQL 2008 database. This application is hosted in 3rd Party Cloud environment. We like to migrate this machine to AWS Cloud environment running Windows 2012, and SQL 2012 database.

I am looking for an expert on IIS, Visual Studio on old version and new release who can help us the migration as quickly as possibly.

Thanks,
Usman


Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 21:53 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:Microsoft IIS, Microsoft Visual Studio
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Angular-5, Material, TypeScript, NgRx, 202112 - Easy Tasks - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced Angular-5 front-end web developer.
To work on EASY TASKS for a great webapp.

This is a long-running project, but feel free to jump on and off, as you like.

The project is Angular-5 front-end webapp connected to a rest web-api backend server.
The project is in production for 3 years, and additional easy tasks are waiting in queue.

The project uses Angular Material (https://material.angular.io/), NgRx, TypeScript.
The webapp serves mobile (mostly) and desktop devices.

The webapp has its architecture, design and implementation style, and we need to make sure further development follows the existing design and implementation conventions:

*. Kind support.
*. Flexible hours.
*. Russian speaker is preferred.


Posted On: December 06, 2021 20:42 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:TypeScript, Angular
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Classic ASP to Razor Page Modernization - Upwork
item.description:
Take a Classic ASP Module and convert it into a modern Razor UI. In addition, this user interface will utilize the Telerik UI for Razpr controls whenever possible.

This primary project will not be a full application, but rather you will be given individual Classic ASP pages and return the equivalent functionality in a modern design. Many additional projects and pages are available if the primary exercise is successful.

Most, if not all pages will be making database calls to MS SQL Server through existing stored procedures. These procedures will not change and SQL knowledge is not needed at this time.

In general, these are not very complex pages and conversion should be rather straightforward.

Hourly Range: $13.00-$45.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 19:20 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:C#, Blazor, ASP.NET Core, ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior Backend Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We require skilled Backend engineers to help build the core of Billsby products, services, and APIs.

As a backend engineer you will design and build platforms, tooling and system solutions that are configurable and scalable.  You will partner with many functions at Billsby, with the opportunity to both work on infrastructure/platform systems, as well as produce direct user-facing business impact.

The development team manages a mix of platform development tasks and new customer driven product solutions. We are seeking people with a strong background or interest in working across these domains to build successful platforms and systems. We are seeking people who enjoy and relish the challenges of dealing with many moving pieces, across remote teams and functions (you will require good attention to detail).

Please see attached file for further details

Hourly Range: $18.00-$35.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 18:23 UTC
Category: Back-End Development

item.content:encoded:
We require skilled Backend engineers to help build the core of Billsby products, services, and APIs.

As a backend engineer you will design and build platforms, tooling and system solutions that are configurable and scalable.  You will partner with many functions at Billsby, with the opportunity to both work on infrastructure/platform systems, as well as produce direct user-facing business impact.

The development team manages a mix of platform development tasks and new customer driven product solutions. We are seeking people with a strong background or interest in working across these domains to build successful platforms and systems. We are seeking people who enjoy and relish the challenges of dealing with many moving pieces, across remote teams and functions (you will require good attention to detail).

Please see attached file for further details

Hourly Range: $18.00-$35.00

Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Microservices, ASP.NET, Entity Framework, Apache Cassandra, PostgreSQL, Business with 10-99 Employees, .NET Core, PHP
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Full Stack Developer / Software Engineer (C# .Net Core JavaScript HTML SQL) - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking two skilled developers to work together in developing features for a production application used by the security industry to manage field employees. They will meet with our technical and managerial contacts a few times a week and work in an agile-like methodology where their tasks are broken into user stories.

We are looking for candidates who have experience writing APIs in .Net Core AND front end: web clients in ReactJS + mobile clients in React Native.
Candidates should be strong in Javascript, C#, and SQL.
Experience with ORMs, database migrations, and Azure tooling is a plus, but not required.
Proficient understanding of code versioning (git) is expected.
Having a knack for writing clean, readable code is a MUST.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$65.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 17:19 UTC

item.description:
Full stack web developer

Responsibilities
Developing and maintaining the entire system, including DBS, CMS, FrontEnd. collection system and more while collaborating with the rest of the team

Requirements

·  High skills in HTML / CSS frontend development.

·  Experience in writing C# on server-side, MVC.Net, and Razor.

·  Experience in popular web frameworks like Vue, Bootstrap and more.

·  Fast learning, well organized, detail-oriented, ability to multi-task, excellent time-management, planning and prioritization.

·  Excellent communication skills.

Advanced

·  Skilled in Database performance tuning, query plan / explain plan analysis, indexing, table partitioning on SQL or NoSQL databases like SQL Server, ElasticSeach, Redis.

·  Monitoring of the status of the Windows servers, check servers performance disks and manage IIS.

·  Knowledge in web scraping and HTTP protocol.

·   Manage cloud apps on AWS like EC2, RDS, CloudFront, Route53 and more.

·  Knowledge of design patterns.

item.title: . Net Developers - Upwork
item.description:
A net developer is responsible for producing code using .net languages such as C# and VB. Net developers create applications from scratch, configure existing systems and provide user support. Also, net developers are able to write functional code with a sharp eye for spotting defects. A net developer's overall goal is to work with internal teams to design, develop and maintain software. Net developers are employed by companies within differing industries.

A bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or any related field along with 3 years of demonstrable experience is required for net developer positions. Successful net developers possess excellent troubleshooting and communication skills and have an eye for details.



Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 11:38 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:.NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, VB.NET, ASP.NET Web API, jQuery, API Integration, ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core
Country: India

item.title: Fullstack Developer (.Net + JavaScript) - Upwork
item.description:
Summary

Our client is a company from Germany, which is one of the largest media agencies in the world. The company is a global leader in marketing, communications and business transformation. The client and its clients specialize in the following areas: Data and Technology, Media Buying and Business Development.

We invite you to join us in a project to develop your own media platform, which allows you to automate the workflow in the field of analytics, budgeting and synchronization of companies with third-party systems.

Technology stack: C#, .Net, .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, MS SQL, React, TypeScript, Rest APIs/JSon, Unit-Test Frameworks.

What to do:

Developing cloud-based web applications to streamline internal processes;
UI development (scripting and styling);
Backend development in service-oriented architecture;
Extension and connection of standard software to business processes in the company;
Regular execution of unit tests and identification of bugs or performance bottlenecks;
Working closely with other teams and contributors (UX designers, PO, architects, QA).
Requirements

C#, .NET experience from 3 years;
Strong knowledge and experience of TypeScript, React (Angular/Vue.js);
Experience of working with .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC;
MS SQL experience;
Experience with Rest APIs/JSon, Unit-Test Frameworks;
English level - confident Intermediate or higher.
Desired skills

Experience with Azure.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$30.00
Posted On: December 06, 2021 11:23 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:.NET Core
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Angular, with angular universal setup - issue with caching - Upwork
item.description:
Angular app with angular universal setup. Issue with caching:
Setup:
- cache busting is enabled for all assets
- no cache headers are set
- version is updated with every release in the package.json (helps with ngsw-worker)
- site hotested on Azure app service

If we add a new route and serve that route directly, the route does not seem to found and 404 is served. Checking the network, it shows that ngsw-worked downloads from server the latest index.html and latest assets/scripts. When served the second time, the new route is properly served.

I am looking for an expert (with very good knowledge of these type of issues in particular) to debug this together with us. Looking for immediate availability.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$45.00
Posted On: December 05, 2021 19:52 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:Angular, Angular 2
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
item.content:encoded:
Angular app with angular universal setup. Issue with caching:
Setup:
- cache busting is enabled for all assets
- no cache headers are set
- version is updated with every release in the package.json (helps with ngsw-worker)
- site hotested on Azure app service

If we add a new route and serve that route directly, the route does not seem to found and 404 is served. Checking the network, it shows that ngsw-worked downloads from server the latest index.html and latest assets/scripts. When served the second time, the new route is properly served.

I am looking for an expert (with very good knowledge of these type of issues in particular) to debug this together with us. Looking for immediate availability.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$45.00
